feed.title: One on One
feed.subtitle: One on One, hosted by Jack Acello and Noah Schwartz, is an all-encompassing basketball podcast, specifically focused on the NBA. Jack and Noah, long-time college roommates, spend much of their free time watching, analyzing, and debating the NBA, and now they get to bring those conversations to the airwaves! Be sure to tune in weekly for some of the best basketball content available!

author.name: High Tops Media & Jack Acello, Noah Schwartz

entry.content:
This week, Jack and Noah break down the second round of the playoffs as all 4 series approach the midway point. The Knicks and Pacers continue to play tight and wild games, the TWolves took home court from the defending champs, and the top seeded Thunder and Celtics are trying to hold off an upset. In addition, the guys discuss the coaching market in Phoenix and LA, as Frank Vogel has been replaced by Mike Budenholzer with the Suns, and the Lakers are in the midst of finding their next coach after the firing of Darvin Ham.

Be sure to tune in to all One on One content and take a look at the show’s social media channels for more activity than ever before. Follow the pod on Twitter (@1on1podHTM), IG (@1on1pod), and on the brand new TikTok (@1on1bballpod) where there will be an increased presence on all of these accounts!

https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/
https://twitter.com/1on1podHTM/
https://www.tiktok.com/@1on1bballpod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

author.name: High Tops Media & Jack Acello, Noah Schwartz

entry.title: NBA Playoffs Talk and NFL Draft Recap and Reactions - Season 3 Episode 29”

link.title: NBA Playoffs Talk and NFL Draft Recap and Reactions - Season 3 Episode 29”

entry.content:
For the first time ever, High Tops Media podcasts, One on One and Heavy Hitters, do a crossover episode as Jack Acello from One on One and Dean Gutic from the Heavy Hitters podcast, along with special guest Lucas Jafet, talk about the NBA playoffs and what has happened so far along with a recap of the NFL draft and their reactions to some of the picks that were made, especially from their teams.

Be sure to tune in to all One on One content and take a look at the show’s social media channels for more activity than ever before. Follow the pod on Twitter (@1on1podHTM), IG (@1on1pod), and on the brand new TikTok (@1on1bballpod) where there will be an increased presence on all of these accounts!

entry.title: First Round Playoff Update, Knicks Win Crazy Game 2, Murray Beats Lakers at Buzzer, Twolves Destroying Suns, Clippers-Mavs Even at 1, and Much More - Season 3 Episode 28”

link.title: First Round Playoff Update, Knicks Win Crazy Game 2, Murray Beats Lakers at Buzzer, Twolves Destroying Suns, Clippers-Mavs Even at 1, and Much More - Season 3 Episode 28”

entry.content:
This week, Jack and Noah discuss each and every first round series and break down the action of the first two games. Among the topics include a breakdown on the wild game 2s in New York and Denver that went down to the wire and ended in heartbreak for Laker and Sixer fans. They also debate where the Suns go from here if they continue losing to Minnesota, and the epic showdown between the Clippers and Mavs.

Be sure to tune in to all One on One content and take a look at the show’s social media channels for more activity than ever before. Follow the pod on Twitter (@1on1podHTM), IG (@1on1pod), and on the brand new TikTok (@1on1bballpod) where there will be an increased presence on all of these accounts!

entry.title: Team USA Set for the 2024 Olympics, NBA Play-In Tournament and Playoff Preview - Season 3 Episode 27”

link.title: Team USA Set for the 2024 Olympics, NBA Play-In Tournament and Playoff Preview - Season 3 Episode 27”

entry.content:
This week, Jack and Noah are joined by longtime friend of the show, Lucas Jafet, and they discuss what Team USA roster will look like in the 2024 Paris Olympic Games. The guys also discuss the end of the NBA regular season and preview the play in the tournament as well as the playoff matches that are set at this time.

Be sure to tune in to all One on One content and take a look at the show’s social media channels for more activity than ever before. Follow the pod on Twitter (@1on1podHTM), IG (@1on1pod), and on the brand new TikTok (@1on1bballpod) where there will be an increased presence on all of these accounts!

entry.title: Final Weekend Craziness, Jrue Holiday Extension, Questions for the Playoffs, Award Picks, Melo or Brunson - Season 3 Episode 26”

link.title: Final Weekend Craziness, Jrue Holiday Extension, Questions for the Playoffs, Award Picks, Melo or Brunson - Season 3 Episode 26”

entry.content:
The regular season is in its final weekend, and the standings are absurdly tight. In fact, the only locked-in playoff series is Clippers-Mavericks! The guys discuss everything you need to know as the season wraps up. Noah and Jack also ask some pertinent questions about this year’s postseason, including their thoughts on the Thunder, the west play-in race, and the Cavs. Then, the boys go deep into their award picks for the 2024 season, including MVP, All-NBA, and Most Improved Player, and finish the show with a debate on the best Knick of the last 15 years.

Be sure to tune in to all One on One content and take a look at the show’s social media channels for more activity than ever before. Follow the pod on Twitter (@1on1podHTM), IG (@1on1pod), and on the brand new TikTok (@1on1bballpod) where there will be an increased presence on all of these accounts!

entry.title: NBA Standings Update, Timberwolves Sale Is Off, Suns Remaining Schedule, Players That Make Us Appreciate the Game, Most Clutch Shot in NBA History - Season 3 Episode 25”

link.title: NBA Standings Update, Timberwolves Sale Is Off, Suns Remaining Schedule, Players That Make Us Appreciate the Game, Most Clutch Shot in NBA History - Season 3 Episode 25”

entry.content:
This week, Jack and Noah discuss the NBA standings as the season winds down. They also talk about the Timberwolves owner not selling the team as originally planned plus they go in depth at what the Suns need to do to finish the year strong. To end it the guys talk about what players this season have made them love the game of basketball and they debate who has the most clutch game winning shot ever.

Be sure to tune in to all One on One content and take a look at the show’s social media channels for more activity than ever before. Follow the pod on Twitter (@1on1podHTM), IG (@1on1pod), and on the brand new TikTok (@1on1bballpod) where there will be an increased presence on all of these accounts!

entry.title: The Red-Hot Rockets, Lakers-Bucks Chaos, Jontay Porter and Sports Gambling - Season 3 Episode 24”

link.title: The Red-Hot Rockets, Lakers-Bucks Chaos, Jontay Porter and Sports Gambling - Season 3 Episode 24”

entry.content:
This week, Jack and Noah discuss the Rockets’ incredible win streak and their chase towards the 10th seed. The guys also talk about the nutty Lakers-Bucks game where LeBron sat, and yet LA still came away with a double overtime win, as well as their concern level for the Celtics after a recent 30 point blown lead to Atlanta. The boys finish the show with an in-depth conversation on sports gambling and the new scandal regarding Raptors’ big man Jontay Porter, as well as a brief debate on the team with the bleakest future for the next 5 years.

Be sure to tune in to all One on One content and take a look at the show’s social media channels for more activity than ever before. Follow the pod on Twitter (@1on1podHTM), IG (@1on1pod), and on the brand new TikTok (@1on1bballpod) where there will be an increased presence on all of these accounts!

entry.title: March Madness Begins, NBA Standings Update, Donovan Mitchell and Mitchell Robinson Injury Update, and What is the Greatest Game Winning Shot in NBA History - Season 3 Episode 23”

link.title: March Madness Begins, NBA Standings Update, Donovan Mitchell and Mitchell Robinson Injury Update, and What is the Greatest Game Winning Shot in NBA History - Season 3 Episode 23”

entry.content:
This week, Jack and Noah give an update on the current NBA standings as well as their predictions for this year’s NCAA tournament. The guys also discuss the injuries to Donovan Mitchell and Mitchell Robinson and when they can get back on the court and what roles they will play. Lastly the guys debate who has the title of having the greatest game winning shot in NBA history.

Be sure to tune in to all One on One content and take a look at the show’s social media channels for more activity than ever before. Follow the pod on Twitter (@1on1podHTM), IG (@1on1pod), and on the brand new TikTok (@1on1bballpod) where there will be an increased presence on all of these accounts!

entry.title: One on One Debuts at 44 Media! Standings Update, the Injury Bug Across the League, Boston’s Tough Week, and the Biggest Threats to the Celtics and Nuggets - Season 3 Episode 22

link.title: One on One Debuts at 44 Media! Standings Update, the Injury Bug Across the League, Boston’s Tough Week, and the Biggest Threats to the Celtics and Nuggets - Season 3 Episode 22

entry.content:
This week, Jack and Noah have taken the show to a studio! The guys recorded in-person at 44 Media, a new local business in Hillsdale, New Jersey. Thanks to the team at 44 Media for all their help with this episode and be sure to follow them on social media @44mediavisuals

They discussed a myriad of topics, including a look at the standings and where teams may finish with a month left in the regular season. Jack and Noah also broke down numerous teams dealing with significant injuries, including the TWolves and Karl-Anthony Towns, the Warriors and Steph Curry, and the Cavs with Evan Mobley and Donovan Mitchell. Next, discussions on the Knicks and the return of OG Anunoby, and Khris Middleton hopefully coming back for the Bucks soon. To finish the show, the guys discussed Boston and their recent concerning losses in Cleveland and Denver, and a debate on the biggest threats to the Celtics and Nuggets in each conference.

Be sure to tune in to all One on One content and take a look at the show’s social media channels for more activity than ever before. Follow the pod on Twitter (@1on1podHTM), IG (@1on1pod), and on the brand new TikTok (@1on1bballpod) where there will be an increased presence on all of these accounts!

https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

entry.title: NBA Standing Update, Knicks Injury Situation, Team USA in 2024 Olympics, and League Looking Into New Defensive Rules - Season 3 Episode 21

link.title: NBA Standing Update, Knicks Injury Situation, Team USA in 2024 Olympics, and League Looking Into New Defensive Rules - Season 3 Episode 21

entry.content:
This week, Jack and Noah discuss what the current NBA Standings look like. The guys also discuss the New York Knicks injury issues and whether or not they can overcome them. The boys also discuss the recent USA men’s olympic basketball roster projection according to Shams Charania. Lastly the guys give their thoughts and ideas into the NBA looking to change defensive rules in order to decrease offense.

The segment about the Knicks was recorded prior to Jalen Brunson’s recent knee injury.

Be sure to tune in to all One on One content and take a look at the show’s social media channels for more activity than ever before. Follow the pod on Twitter (@1on1podHTM), IG (@1on1pod), and on the brand new TikTok (@1on1bballpod) where there will be an increased presence on all of these accounts!
